description:
When I first saw Roy I thought he looked like he just walked off the set of "Oz"... muscular and rugged and very tough looking. He didn't smile much at first and he didn't seem big on conversation, but after breaking the ice he warmed up and started talking about his girlfriend. When we turned on the camera on him, though, he got stiff again and turned into one of those guys who gives one and two word answers. Getting him naked seemed to make him more comfortable.
I wasn't sure how the video was going to turn out until he shot his first big load (nice!)...
title: Roy
